about_the_game:
Loggerhead Prologue Demo


Loggerhead Prologue Demo is a taste of the final game and is a homage to the survival horror classics.

  • Tank Controls
  • Fixed Camera Angels
  • Limited Resources
  • Puzzles
  • Relentless Ghouls
  • Terrible Voice Acting

Set in 1985, (one year before the full version). The prologue chapter follows the unfortunate events of the two playable characters Gary and Sharon.

On their way to the condemned Boggarogga creek campsite the hapless couple stop nearby for a for a pack of cigarettes. What follows is a night of true terror as they soon realize that saving a few dollary-doo's on a holiday might not be worth the trouble.

Get a taste for the full version with all the creature comforts of the beloved survival horror genre with Australia's inferior answer to Resident Evil; Loggerhead.

I hope you enjoy the demo, I would appreciate any constructive feedback.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains, a few bad words, a bit of gore, some scary bits and some terrible voice acting.

detailed_description:
Update Notes

V1.1 Demo Updates

Thank you so much everyone who has played and enjoyed the demo. Love the feedback I have received.
Thus I have made a few small tweaks based on feedback.
  • Cricket Bat swings much faster - better melee combat.
  • Character turn speed is slightly faster.
  • Cash note a bit clearer on what to do with the cash.
  • Slight improvement to the animation transitions (characters should slide less).

Next I will look at


  • Overall animation system improvement.
  • Sound design - general sound improvements.

    I will keep updating the demo as best I can - but must indeed begin working on the final game. Again thank you for the support I have received so far.

    • Tank Controls
    • Fixed Camera Angels

    • Terrible Voice Acting

    Set in 1985, (one year before the full version). The prologue chapter follows the unfortunate events of the two playable characters Gary and Sharon.

    On their way to the condemned Boggarogga creek campsite the hapless couple stop nearby for a for a pack of cigarettes. What follows is a night of true terror as they soon realize that saving a few dollary-doo's on a holiday might not be worth the trouble.

    Get a taste for the full version with all the creature comforts of the beloved survival horror genre with Australia's inferior answer to Resident Evil; Loggerhead.

    I hope you enjoy the demo, I would appreciate any constructive feedback.
name: Loggerhead Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Loggerhead Prologue Demo is a retro survival horror set in Australia during the 1980's, inspired by PSX classics such as Resident Evil and Silent Hill. Complete with Tank controls, fixed camera angels and limited resources do you have what it takes to survive a terrifying night in Boggarogga creek?
